LocaleResource.Name: NopAjaxCart
LocaleResource.Value: Nop Ajax Cart

LocaleResource.Name: Admin
LocaleResource.Value: Nop Ajax Cart

LocaleResource.Name: Settings
LocaleResource.Value: Nop Ajax Cart Settings

LocaleResource.Name: EnableOnProductPage
LocaleResource.Value: Enable Nop Ajax Cart on Product Page

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether the Nop Ajax Cart functionality is enabled on product page.

LocaleResource.Name: EnableOnCatalogPages
LocaleResource.Value: Enable Nop Ajax Cart on Catalog Pages

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether the Nop Ajax Cart functionality is enabled on catalog pages such as category, manufacturer, recently viewed, recently added, etc. pages.

LocaleResource.Name: EnableProductQuantityTextBox
LocaleResource.Value: Enable Product Quantity Text Box On Catalog Pages

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether the product quantity text box is enabled for products on the category page.

LocaleResource.Name: EnableOnMultiProductVariants
LocaleResource.Value: Enable Ajax Cart On Multi Product Variants On Catalog Pages

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether the Ajax Cart should be used for multi product variants on catalog pages.

LocaleResource.Name: CategoryPageProductsPanelSelector
LocaleResource.Value: Category Page Products Panel Selector

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The selector for the html element on the category page, which contains the products. The Nop Ajax Cart plugin uses this element to add dynamic content to it, like modal dialogs and ajax busy animation.

LocaleResource.Name: ProductDetailsPageProductPanelSelector
LocaleResource.Value: Product Details Page Product Panel Selector

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The selector for the html element on the product details page, which contains the product details information. The Nop Ajax Cart plugin uses this element to add dynamic content to it, like modal dialogs and ajax busy animation.

LocaleResource.Name: ShoppingCartMenuLinkSelector
LocaleResource.Value: Shopping Cart Menu Link Selector

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The selector for the html element in the header link, which contains information about the number of items in the shopping cart.

LocaleResource.Name: MiniShoppingCartPanelSelector
LocaleResource.Value: Mini Shopping Cart Panel Selector

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The selector for the mini shopping cart panel. It is used by the Nop Ajax Cart plugin to update the mini shopping cart after a product has been added to the shopping cart.

LocaleResource.Name: FlyoutCartPanelSelector
LocaleResource.Value: Flyout Shopping Cart Panel Selector

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The selector for the flyout shopping cart panel. It is used by the Nop Ajax Cart plugin to update the flyout shopping cart after a product has been added to the shopping cart.

LocaleResource.Name: ProductAddedToCartImageSize
LocaleResource.Value: Product Added To Cart Image Size (pixels)

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specify the image size of the image displayed on the product added to cart window (in pixels).

LocaleResource.Name: Theme
LocaleResource.Value: Theme

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Select the theme for the Ajax Cart

LocaleResource.Name: EnableAutomaticIntegration
LocaleResource.Value: Enable Automatic Integration

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enables automatic integration of the Nop Ajax Cart plugin.

LocaleResource.Name: ShoppingCartNotificationBoxQuantity
LocaleResource.Value: Quantity

LocaleResource.Name: ShoppingCartNotificationBoxContinueShopping
LocaleResource.Value: CONTINUE SHOPPING

LocaleResource.Name: ShoppingCartNotificationBoxViewYourBasket
LocaleResource.Value: VIEW YOUR BASKET

LocaleResource.Name: ShoppingCartNotificationBoxTitle
LocaleResource.Value: Just Added To Your Basket
